income_messages:
From: h*********5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 06:05:39
SUBJECT:   FACT FINDING OFFICE
  FACT FINDING OFFICE
INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT CENTRE,
152-160 CITY RD, LONDON EC1V 2NX,
UNITED KINGDOM
Attn:Beneficiary
Sequel to the mandate of the United Nations to clear and release all
processed funds not associated with drugs and terrorist activities to
deserving beneficiaries without further delay. It may interest you to know
that based on the current financial policy on all foreign
payments.
The International payment outlets has approved your outstanding payment
worth US15.5Million with the accrued interest via any of her cash payment
centers in Southan Africa, Asia or America.
The implication of this approval is that every short listed beneficiary
like you must travel to the assigned endorsement office in
person to sign the necessary fund release order documents/bond before
proceeding to the cash payment center for proper immediate payment release
without requesting for any upfront fees/charges.
We are aware of the cost implication/expenses involved on this process
knowing fully well that you might be unable to take care of the high
traveling expenses associated in this process.In respect of the above
subject we have contracted the services of a
seasoned investor/ sponsor who will cover every expenses needed on
this process including your return flight tickets, hotel reservations,
feeding and taxi respectively hence you will not be expected to put forward
any money from your pocket on this subject.
Please note that the investor is demanding for 15% only of your total
payment as his entitlement for the sponsorship. I hope this
arrangement is OK by you? it is important you revert back to us urgently to
enable us proceed with the needful accordingly.
hanks for your kind understanding.
Yours Faithfully
Hon. Edward Hicks
Payment Coordinator,
International Payment Center.   
From: h*********5@gmail.com
To: kz37597@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 09:55:00
SUBJECT: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
Attention: Gloria Lee,
Your mail has been received and the contents noted down. First, It is very
important for you to know that this very process is different from your
previous dealings with the fraudster, this is not a child's play.  It is a
once in a life time opportunity for you to receive your long overdue
funds/payment in person without any upfront payment or hitch.
The sponsor of this project is a seasoned investor who will cover every
expenses/charges needed to complete this project, before the final release
of your funds payment. The investor is only demanding 15% of your total
long due funds payment worth US$15.5M, as his entitlement for the
sponsorship of this project.
It is purely legal and everything will be handled through bank to bank
transaction, after you have concluded signing the Final Funds Release Order
Documents in one of the payment outlet.
You're not expected to pay any upfront fees like your previous dealings
with the scammers.  Be also informed that a good hospitality, security are
guaranteed with proper medical arrangements in place, during your trip to
our payment outlet until you received your funds payment and returned back.
But you need to take your Covid Vaccination full dose and have proof of it
before you'll be allowed to embark on the trip. Also, you are advised to
come with your proper medications if you're on medical treatment.   Your
feeding, hotel accommodation and other logistics would be paid for in your
favor once you indicate your readiness.
So, there is nothing else to worry about. Your travel is estimated to be
less than a 5 days trip. Taxi money will be provided too upon your arrival
and further money for expenses will be given to you too upon your arrival.
In order for us to commence and proceed with the processing of your claim,
you are expected to reconfirm your details as requested below:
Your Full Name:
Contact Address:
Phone Number:
Nationality:
Scanned copies of your International Passport:
We await you to revert back to indicate your readiness.
Yours Faithfully
Hon. Edward Hicks
International Payment Center.

Gloria Lee
